subject: Different radios in use from E ngland
author: Laura Kimberley
full_text:
Well All,  
The group paraforensics are grounded and pray before each session.
Jaine is a well known Medium and Ray is a well known investigator.

They do there own thing with fun and exploration in mind. Take it for
what it is worth. There good, and we taught them the rules and their
listening. http://www.youtube.com/paraforensics

LK
